Trade/Device Name(s): Quidel Molecular Influenza A + B Assay
Regulation Name(s): Respiratory viral panel multiplex nucleic acid assay
Methodologies: Multiplex nucleic acid amplification and detection
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for Quidel Molecular Influenza A + B multiplex RT-PCR assay for detection and differentiation of influenza A and B viral RNA in nasal and nasopharyngeal swabs.
Indications for Use Summary: Multiplex RT-PCR assay for qualitative detection and differentiation of influenza A and B viral RNA in nasal and nasopharyngeal swabs from symptomatic patients, aiding differential diagnosis of influenza A and B infection in conjunction with clinical and epidemiological factors.
